snippet: Fed up with being accused of doping, Rafael Nadal has written to the president of the International Tennis Federation and asked for all of his drug-test results and blood profile records to be made public....
lead_paragraph: Fed up with being accused of doping, Rafael Nadal has written to the president of the International Tennis Federation and asked for all of his drug-test results and blood profile records to be made public.

headline.print_headline: Rafael Nadal Wants His Drug-Test Results Made Public
headline.main: Rafael Nadal Wants His Drug-Test Results Made Public
